item.title: Is Banking Dental Stem Cells today is important?
item.description: At the time of child birth, preserving and banking umbilical cord stem cells is important. These cells are the mesenchymal cells which differentiate to develop human organs like Brain, heart, liver, kidney, muscles etc at the developing stage of a baby in the mother womb. In case you miss collecting or preserving stem cells at the time of birth? Then the best choice is to collect Dental stem cell
item.dc:creator: Jyothi
